name: Specification / Standard: AS4654.1-2012; AS3740 - 2010, ManufacturerÅEfs Technical Data Sheet
Check Substrate. Check for cracks/defect in concrete. Check critical areas (puddle flanges, penetrations, expansion joints, rebates/setdowns).
Prepare Substrate. (moisture test if required) and prepare surface to accept primer using a scraper or grinder and vacuum or sweep residual debris.
Check label on drum(s) to ensure correct material is being used
Apply primer (Enviro Shield/Enviro prime P2 or Enviro Epoxy B-LV) by brush/roller
Caulking. Apply Enviro Flex FC junction fillets (where applicable)
Mixing and Application. Mix Enviro 700X thoroughtly using mechanical mixer. Apply Enviro 700X using brush/roller achieving 1.6mm WFT / 1.5mm DFT.
If aggregate is required, broadcast at correct coverage while 1st coat has been applied and is in it's wet state prior to curing
Lay Geotextile Fabric to Drainage Cell
Final signoff and handover. Visually inspect and ensure adequately cured. Check for any pinholes and bubbles. Sign-off from builder and hand-over
HOLD POINT - CLICK HERE TO REQUEST BUILDER SIGN OFF
